review_data.title: Terrible service, waiting forever
review_data.content: Terrible service, takes over an hour to get a pizza! Service don’t even bother to ask you for a drink. Food was ok, but such a disorganized place.

review_data.title: Great food
review_data.content: Great food and open at good time! I hate waiting to specific Swiss times to eat. Sometimes I skip lunch and have an early dinner at 4pm or 5pm and there are very few restaurants open in ZH at that time. thankfully Cucina isn't one...More
